snippet.title: Ninja Ducks vs Pirate Pigs - Gameplay Teaser
snippet.description:
Since the dawn of time… two sides locked in rivalry!
The mysterious Ninjas: quick, cunning and precise! Versus the fearless Pirates: troublesome, rowdy and ruthless! Your agility and your skills will be tested as you fight through battles ranging from chaotic waves of enemies, to tense parkour areas with short platforms and daunting drops.

Embark on a grand journey as you assume the role of Krispy, a feared Ninja Duck warrior, and battle through 100 stunning, beautifully illustrated levels: starting from the war-ravaged rooftops of the Ninja homeworld and finishing the fight in the perilous Pirate docks!

An arsenal of weapons and upgrades are at your command: bring the power of lightning down upon your hapless foes, launch devastating balls of fire to cut a path through your enemies, throw deadly shurikens to quickly and precisely dispatch enemies, and when all other options are exhausted; strike down your foes with your trusty blade!

Players of Ninja Ducks vs. Pirate Pigs have 100 levels available to complete, each with varying objectives such as reaching a distance goal, or killing a certain amount of enemies with a specific weapon - each of which must be completed before players can progress. Coins collected throughout all of the levels and from vanquished enemies can be used to upgrade the efficiency of your weapons, the amount of health you have, or an increase the amount of coins dropped by enemies – players that have amassed large amounts of coins can even use them to skip difficult levels!

Ninja Ducks vs. Pirate Pigs is free to download and available today…

IOS (free):         
https://apps.apple.com/us/app/ninja-ducks-vs-pirate-pigs/id1532423301 

GOOGLE (free):     
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.uk.kokodigital.ninjaducks
